PAL.NAME: Dynamics AX 40/2009
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Dynamics AX 40/2009.

ANALYSIS.NAME: Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server Actice Sessions
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of currently Active server Sessions

ANALYSIS.NAME: Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server Total Sessions
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The total number of Active Sessions since the AOS instance started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server Number of Bytes Received by Server
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Received by Server
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of bytes received by the Application Object Server (AOS) instance since it started.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Received by Server
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Received by Server

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Received by Server
CHART.DATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Received by Server

ANALYSIS.NAME: Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server Number of Bytes Sent by Server
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Sent by Server
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of bytes sent by the AOS instance since it started.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Sent by Server
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Sent by Server

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Sent by Server
CHART.DATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Bytes Sent by Server

ANALYSIS.NAME: Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server Number of Client Requests
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of client-to-server requests since the AOS instance started.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests
CHART.DATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests

ANALYSIS.NAME: Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server Number of Client Requests per Second
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests per Second
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of client-to-server requests processed per second by the AOS instance.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests per Second
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests per Second

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests per Second
CHART.DATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Client Requests per Second

ANALYSIS.NAME: Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server Number of Server Requests
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Server Requests
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of server-to-client requests processed since the AOS instance started.

DATASOURCE.NAME: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Total Sessions
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Server Requests

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Server Requests
CHART.DATASOURCE: \Microsoft Dynamics AX Object Server(*)\Number of Server Requests
